Susannah late WELLS spinster, of Acle
Farmer from Sco Ruston.  Was killed by falling from a waggon the wheels going over his body.
Of The Close, Norwich.  Patent Customer of the port of Yarmouth and many years for Commission? Of the Peace.  He served the shire as High Sheriff for Norfolk 1740.
A Liquor Merchant from Neatishead.  A married man.  He fell into the river at Horning ferry and was drowned.
Clerk of Hoveton St. Peter for 33 y.
Son of Benjamin, deceased  Susannah WELLS
